name: part_000
file: tmp_【#ときのそら100万人への軌跡】思い出振り返り、これからに向けて・・・【記念配信】 [IYlN1ellaCU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro graphic showing Tokino Sora's trajectory to 1 million subscribers.
Intro montage featuring various milestones and clips from Tokino Sora's history.
Live performance of the song 'Kami no mani mani' by Tokino Sora and other Hololive members.
scenes.song_name: Kami no mani mani (神のまにまに)

subtitles.original: 思い通りにいかないことだらけ
subtitles.english: Everything's just not going the way I want

subtitles.original: どうしようもなく自己嫌悪
subtitles.english: I'm feeling so much self-hatred, there's nothing I can do

subtitles.original: 八百万の痛みや悲しみから
subtitles.english: From the myriad of pains and sorrows

subtitles.original: 逃げ込める場所を探してる
subtitles.english: I'm searching for a place to flee into

subtitles.original: いっそ岩の隙間に引きこもって
subtitles.english: I'll go and hide in a crevice between the rocks

subtitles.original: 月も太陽も無視して寝よう
subtitles.english: Ignoring both the moon and the sun, I'll sleep

subtitles.original: 生まれてきたことの意味なんて
subtitles.english: The meaning of having been born and all that

subtitles.original: 知らない、分かんないよ
subtitles.english: I don't know, I don't understand!

subtitles.original: でも そんな風に思えるってこと
subtitles.english: But the fact that you can feel that way

subtitles.original: それは
subtitles.english: That's

subtitles.original: 君がもっともっと素敵になれる力があるって
subtitles.english: It shows you have the power to become even more wonderful

subtitles.original: 教えてるんだよ
subtitles.english: It's telling you that

subtitles.original: さあ 神のまにまに 仰せのままに
subtitles.english: Now, as the gods will, as they command

subtitles.original: 誰だって地球を愛してる
subtitles.english: Everyone loves the earth

subtitles.original: 飲めや歌えや どんちゃん騒ぎ
subtitles.english: Drink and sing, make a huge racket

subtitles.original: たまにゃそんなんもいいんじゃね？
subtitles.english: Isn't that fine every once in a while?

subtitles.original: そうさ北も南も 右も左も
subtitles.english: That's right, north or south, right or left

subtitles.original: なんだかんだ地球を愛してる
subtitles.english: One way or another, we love the earth

subtitles.original: 泥んこだけど 歩いて行ける
subtitles.english: It's muddy, but we can walk on

subtitles.original: まだまだ先は長いさ
subtitles.english: The road ahead is still long

subtitles.original: ただ 正しい人でいたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to be a righteous person

subtitles.original: きっと誰もがそう願っているけど
subtitles.english: Surely everyone wishes for that, but

subtitles.original: 八百万の心の醜さに
subtitles.english: By the ugliness of myriad hearts

subtitles.original: 苦しめられる毎日さ
subtitles.english: I'm tormented every day

subtitles.original: 僕が生まれてきたこと 奇跡と言えば
subtitles.english: If I say that my being born was a miracle

subtitles.original: 聞こえはいいけど
subtitles.english: It sounds nice, but

subtitles.original: それは単なる偶然にすぎなくて
subtitles.english: That's nothing more than a mere coincidence

subtitles.original: やっぱり意味なんてないさ
subtitles.english: After all, there's no meaning in it

subtitles.original: でも 例えば君に
subtitles.english: But, for example, for you...
